item.title: 威尔逊网球拍制造商 Amer Sports 一季度业绩超出预期，原因是需求强劲
item.description: Amer Sports 周二公布的第一季度营收和利润超出市场预期，主要得益于定价提高以及中国和美国市场对其畅销体育用品品牌的强劲需求。【原文：Amer Sports topped market expectations for first-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, helped by higher pricing and robust demand for its popular sporting goods brands in China and the United States.】

item.title: 壳牌股东否决投资者气候决议
item.description: 壳牌公司股东周二否决了一批投资者提出的一项决议，该决议敦促该能源公司制定更严格的气候目标。【原文：Shell shareholders on Tuesday rejected a resolution filed by a group of investors urging the energy company to set tighter climate targets.】

item.title: 国务院副总理：中国将控制房地产业风险
item.description: 中国国务院副总理何立峰周二表示，中国将控制房地产行业、地方政府债务和小型地方金融机构相互交织的风险。【原文：China will control the intertwined risks in the property sector, local government debt and small local financial institutions, Vice Premier He Lifeng said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 环联称，第一季度美国汽车保险购物者激增 6
item.description: 根据信用报告机构全美保险公司（TransUnion）的数据，第一季度购买汽车保险的美国客户数量比去年同期增加了 6%，这表明在通胀挤压消费者钱包的情况下，保险公司正在努力降低成本。【原文：The number of U.S. customers shopping for auto insurance in the first quarter was 6% higher than a year earlier, according to credit reporting agency TransUnion , underscoring efforts to cut costs as inflation squeezes consumer wallets.】

item.title: 汽车零部件需求旺盛，AutoZone 季度利润超预期
item.description: 本周二，AutoZone 第三季度利润超出预期，主要原因是汽车零部件需求强劲，因为在新车型价格上涨和等待时间延长的情况下，越来越多的美国人继续使用他们的老旧汽车。【原文：AutoZone beat estimates for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by strong demand for automotive parts as more Americans held on to their ageing cars amid higher prices and wait times for newer models.】

item.title: 雀巢将向 Wegovy 和 Ozempic 用户出售 5 美元披萨和三明治
item.description: 雀巢公司将在美国市场上销售一种价值 5 美元的新型冷冻披萨和富含蛋白质的意大利面，雀巢公司称这种产品是专为服用 Wegovy 或 Ozempic 等减肥药物的人设计的。【原文：Nestle will market a new, $5 line of frozen pizzas and protein-enriched pastas in the United States which it says it designed specifically for people taking drugs such as Wegovy or Ozempic for weight loss.】

item.title: 需求低迷导致梅西百货季度销售额降幅大于预期
item.description: 梅西百货公司周二公布的第一季度销售额降幅大于预期，由于来自非价格零售商的激烈竞争，购物者对服装和鞋类等产品的消费日益谨慎，梅西百货公司的业绩受到影响。【原文：Macy's posted a bigger-than-expected drop in first-quarter sales on Tuesday, hobbled by stiff competition from off-price retailers for shoppers increasingly cautious about spending on products such as apparel and footwear.】

item.title: 中国科技巨头降低用于支持人工智能聊天机器人的语言模型价格
item.description: 随着中国云计算领域价格战的升温，中国科技巨头阿里巴巴和百度周二下调了用于支持生成式人工智能产品的大型语言模型（LLM）的价格。【原文：Chinese tech giants Alibaba and Baidu slashed prices on Tuesday of large-language models (LLMs) used to power generative artificial intelligence products, as a price war in the cloud computing sector heats up in China.】

item.title: 美联储政策谨慎，期指持稳，英伟达业绩值得期待
item.description: 美国股指期货周二走势平淡，原因是投资者在本周人工智能芯片领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）发布财报前不愿大举押注，而且美联储官员在央行会议纪要发布前对政策持谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. index futures were muted on Tuesday, as investors refrained from placing big bets before AI chip leader Nvidia's earnings this week and amid policy caution from Federal Reserve officials ahead of the central bank's meeting minutes.】

item.title: Lowe's 销售额降幅低于预期，原因是小型维修需求增加
item.description: 周二，劳氏公司（Lowe's Cos）公布的季度销售额降幅低于预期，这主要得益于受通胀影响的美国人进行了更多的小规模维修，否则他们就会减少大笔可自由支配的家庭装修项目。【原文：Lowe's Cos reported a lower-than-expected drop in quarterly sales on Tuesday, helped by more small-scale repairs undertaken by inflation-hit Americans, who have otherwise cut back on big-ticket discretionary home improvement projects.】

item.title: 中国 JD.com 旨在通过可转换债券交易融资 15 亿美元
item.description: 根据周二提交给监管机构的文件，中国在线零售商剑网（JD.com）将通过出售可转换债券融资 15 亿美元。【原文：Chinese online retailer JD.com is raising $1.5 billion via a convertible bond sale, according to the company's regulatory filings on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大银行季度利润因坏账拨备增加而承压
item.description: 加拿大银行预计将留出资金以应对挑战性的日子，这将损害季度收益，因为投资者正在等待有关贷款机构将如何应对长期高利率环境的评论，这种环境已经抑制了信贷增长。【原文：Canadian banks are expected to set aside money for challenging days, which will hurt quarterly earnings, as investors await commentary on how the lenders will navigate a prolonged high interest-rate environment that has dented credit growth.】

item.title: 加州法院将权衡将应用程序司机视为承包商的法律命运
item.description: 加利福尼亚州最高法院周二将审理一个工会对允许 Uber 和 Lyft 等应用服务公司将本州司机归类为独立承包商而非享有更多福利的雇员的投票措施提出的质疑。【原文：California's top state court on Tuesday will consider a labor union's challenge to a ballot measure allowing app-based services such as Uber and Lyft to classify drivers in the state as independent contractors rather than as employees with more benefits.】

item.title: 独家报道：保守派投资者撤回摩根大通决议，理由是应对 "政治化金融 "的变革
item.description: 据该投资者的代表称，一名保守派股东已经撤回了在本周二的摩根大通年度会议上提交表决的一项决议，他说此举反映了这家华尔街银行为更多地考虑不同观点而做出的改变。【原文：A conservative shareholder has withdrawn a resolution filed for a vote at Tuesday's annual meeting of JPMorgan, according to the investor's representative, who said the move reflects changes the Wall Street bank has made to take more account of diverse viewpoints.】

item.title: 早间竞价：平静的市场徘徊在高点附近，金属回落
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 投资者对以太坊 ETF 持乐观态度，加密货币上涨
item.description: 由于市场猜测追踪全球第二大加密货币的美国现货交易基金的申请结果，周二以太币将创下近两年来的最大两日涨幅，比特币也逼近历史新高。【原文：Ether was set for its largest two-day gain in nearly two years and bitcoin approached a record high on Tuesday on speculation about the outcome of applications for U.S. spot exchange-traded funds that track the world's second-biggest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 耶伦称美欧必须联合应对中国工业产能过剩问题
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周二表示，美国和欧洲需要以 "战略性的联合方式 "应对中国的工业政策，以保持大西洋两岸制造商的生存能力。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Tuesday that the United States and Europe needed to respond to China's industrial policies in a "strategic and united way" to keep manufacturers viable on both sides of the Atlantic.】

item.title: VinFast 因未支付展厅租金在美国被起诉
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 因未支付一家商店的租金而被加州一家法院起诉，根据房地产服务公司 SPG Center LLC 提起的诉讼，VinFast 称这是不准确的。【原文：Vietnam's electric vehicle maker VinFast is being sued in a California court for not having paid rent for a store, according to a complaint filed by real estate services firm SPG Center LLC, which VinFast said was inaccurate.】

item.title: 礼来公司的糖尿病药物替扎帕肽在中国获得批准
item.description: 礼来公司周二表示，其糖尿病药物替塞帕肽已获得中国监管机构的批准，这将加剧其与丹麦竞争对手诺和诺德公司在这一重要亚洲市场的竞争。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday its diabetes drug tirzepatide has received approval from Chinese regulators, setting up intensifying competition with its Danish rival Novo Nordisk in the key Asian market.】

item.title: 耶伦敦促德国银行加强遵守美国对俄罗斯的制裁措施
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周二敦促德国银行高管加大力度遵守对俄罗斯的制裁，并停止规避制裁的努力，以避免自己受到潜在的处罚，从而切断美元的使用。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen urged German bank executives on Tuesday to step up efforts to comply with sanctions against Russia and shut down efforts to circumvent them to avoid potential penalties themselves that would cut off dollar access.】

item.title: IBM 将更多人工智能模型开源并与沙特阿拉伯达成协议
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）周二表示，它将以开源软件的形式发布一系列人工智能模型，并将帮助沙特阿拉伯用阿拉伯语训练人工智能系统。【原文：International Business Machines on Tuesday said that it will release a family of artificial intelligence models as open-source software, and that it will help Saudi Arabia train an AI system in Arabic.】

item.title: 卡地亚和路威酩轩集团（LVMH）期待巴黎以外的商店为奥运零售业注入活力
item.description: 今年夏天，法国以外的欧洲城市的奢侈品零售商正在争夺腰缠万贯的游客的生意，赌的就是游客的激增，以避免奥运期间巴黎的拥挤和街道关闭。【原文：Luxury retailers in European cities outside France are jockeying for business from deep pocketed tourists this summer, betting on a surge in visitors avoiding crowds and street closures in Paris during the Olympic Games.】

item.title: 英国建议万事达卡和维萨卡承担义务以加强竞争
item.description: 英国支付系统监管机构周二在一份临时报告中说，威士卡和万事达卡是核心信用卡服务的最大参与者，在这些服务领域没有有效的竞争，需要为用户提供更多的透明度。【原文：There is no effective competition in core credit card services where Visa and Mastercard are the biggest players, and more transparency for users is needed, Britain's Payment Systems Regulator said in an interim report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿斯利康的目标是到 2030 年实现总收入 800 亿美元
item.description: 阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）周二表示，受预计推出 20 种新药以及癌症、生物制药和罕见病产品组合增长的推动，该公司的目标是到 2030 年收入增长约 75%，达到 800 亿美元。【原文：AstraZeneca aims to grow revenue by about 75% to $80 billion by 2030, it said on Tuesday, boosted by the expected launch of 20 new medicines and through growth in its cancer, biopharmaceuticals and rare disease portfolio.】

item.title: 赛诺菲与 OpenAI 和 Formation Bio 合作开发人工智能驱动的药物
item.description: 法国制药商赛诺菲公司周二宣布，它将与人工智能公司OpenAI和Formation Bio合作，通过使用人工智能促进其药物开发项目。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi on Tuesday announced it is collaborating with artificial intelligence company OpenAI and Formation Bio to boost its drug development projects through the use of Artificial Intelligence.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，苹果供应商富士康是被要求在越南减少用电量的企业之一
item.description: 越南官员呼吁苹果供应商富士康自愿将其位于越南北部的组装厂的用电量减少 30%，两位熟悉内情的人士说，去年北部曾发生过停电事件。【原文：Vietnamese officials have called on Apple supplier Foxconn to voluntarily reduce power use by 30% at its assembly plants in the north of the country where there were electricity outages last year, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 前财政部长表示，泰国新任财政部长有机会改善紧张的央行关系
item.description: 泰国前财政部长提拉猜-普瓦纳那拉努巴拉（Thirachai Phuvanatnaranubala）周二表示，泰国新任财政部长已避免向央行施压，并有机会在长期存在的利率分歧中改善关系。【原文：Thailand's new finance minister has refrained from pressuring the central bank and has a chance to improve relations amid a longstanding disagreement on interest rates, former finance minister Thirachai Phuvanatnaranubala said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 以 imec 为首的欧洲实验室将获得 27 亿美元的芯片法案资助
item.description: 比利时imec公司周三表示，根据《欧洲芯片法案》，欧洲领先的研究实验室将获得25亿欧元（27.2亿美元）的资助，用于建立一条试验线，开发和测试未来几代先进的计算机芯片。【原文：Leading European research labs will receive 2.5 billion euros ($2.72 billion) in funding under the European Chips Act to set up a pilot line to develop and test future generations of advanced computer chips, Belgium's imec said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 期权显示英伟达盈利可能引发 2,000 亿美元股价波动
item.description: 美国期权市场显示，在周三芯片制造商英伟达公布财报后，交易商对该公司股价的大幅波动进行了定价，但对波动幅度的预期比过去更为温和。【原文：Traders are pricing in a big move for Nvidia’s shares after the chipmaker reports earnings on Wednesday, though expectations for volatility are more muted than in the past, U.S. options markets show.】

item.title: 早间竞价新闻真空吸走市场动力
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】
